definitions: the activity of sparring with an imaginary opponent as a form of training

examples.text: train for agility with fast shadowboxing

shortDefinitions: activity of sparring with imaginary opponent as form of training

definitions: the action of making a show of tackling a problem or opponent while avoiding any direct engagement

examples.text: politcal shadowboxing often slowed down the process

shortDefinitions: action of making show of tackling problem or opponent while avoiding any direct engagement
